description: This file is a header (.h) file for the RDK Utilities API, providing function prototypes and include guards related to logger environment configurations and utility functions.

methods.name: rdk_logger_envGet
methods.description: Retrieves the environment variable associated with the specified name.

methods.name: rdk_logger_envGetNum
methods.description: Obtains the number associated with a logger module.

methods.name: rdk_logger_envGetValueFromNum
methods.description: Gets the environment variable value based on its numeric identifier.

methods.name: rdk_logger_envGetModFromNum
methods.description: Returns the module name associated with a numeric identifier.

methods.name: rdk_logger_env_add_conf_file
methods.description: Adds a configuration file for the logger environment.
